name: part_008
file: tmp_≪-KAGURA- Dance of the Gods 3D LIVE≫ Hakos Baelz Birthday 2025 + ANNOUNCEMENTS! #BaeDDay2025 [viPlIHvk724]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Asa ga Kuru' by Hakos Baelz.
Performance of the song 'BANG!!!' by Hakos Baelz.
MC section where Hakos Baelz discusses the performance and announces birthday goods.

subtitles.original: …君を呼んでいるねえいえいえ…
subtitles.english: ...is calling out to you, yeah, yeah, yeah...

subtitles.original: 傷だらけの 世界の頭上に…
subtitles.english: Over this scarred world...

subtitles.original: BANG!!!
subtitles.english: BANG!!!

subtitles.original: 好き 嫌い 常識 I don't care I don't care
subtitles.english: Likes, dislikes, common sense, I don't care, I don't care

subtitles.original: …with a bang!
subtitles.english: ...with a bang!

subtitles.original: かかってこい Majority 私に負けはなし
subtitles.english: Come at me, Majority, there's no losing for me

subtitles.original: ここまでって引くんだ そのボーダー誰のルール？
subtitles.english: Drawing a line here, whose rule is that border anyway?

subtitles.original: あの日乗り越えた ウィンカー 強くなった…
subtitles.english: The blinker I passed that day, I've grown stronger...

subtitles.original: …私が笑い飛ばしてあげる ハハ！
subtitles.english: ...I'll laugh it all off for you, haha!

subtitles.original: 言いたいことは言う やりたくないことはしない
subtitles.english: I'll say what I want, I won't do what I don't want to

subtitles.english: I don't care about malice, it's just a waste of everyone's time

subtitles.original: 私 私も構わない ニューノーマルの事態

subtitles.english: Everybody say I want to be free

subtitles.english: Everybody say I want to live more
